name: Handwashing Helper
description:
Washing your hands has never been more important but many find the traditional handwashing experience to be quite lacking. Handwashing Helper brings handwashing to the competitive esports scene by allowing you to compete with clean folk from around the world in the ultimate wash-em-off!

Team
  • Del Nordlund
  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Thiago Schiefer
